cls

Class Aircraft

  • java.lang.Object
    • cls.Aircraft

  • public class Aircraft
extends java.lang.Object

    Aircraft

    Represents an in-game aircraft. Calculates velocity, route-following, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Aircraft.AirportState
      Airport states
      static class  Aircraft.AltitudeState
      Altitude states

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Aircraft> aircraftTooNear
      Holds a list of aircraft currently in violation of separation rules with this aircraft
      private Airport airport
      The target airport (if applicable)
      private int altitudeChangeSpeed
      The speed to climb or fall by
      private Aircraft.AltitudeState altitudeState
      The current state of the aircraft's altitude, i.e.
      private double bearingLeniency
      How far off course the aircraft must be for its bearing to be corrected
      private boolean collisionWarningSoundFlag
      Flags whether the collision warning sound has been played before.
      static int COMPASS_RADIUS
      How large to draw the bearing circle.
      private double currentlyTurningBy
      The angle the aircraft is currently turning by
      private int currentRouteStage
      The current stage the aircraft is at in its route

      The position the aircraft is currently flying towards (if not manually controlled)

      The off-screen point (or airport) the aircraft will end up at before disappearing

      The name of the location the aircraft is flying to

      The flight name of the aircraft

      The image to be drawn representing the aircraft
      private double initialSpeed
      The initial speed of the aircraft
      private boolean isManuallyControlled
      Whether the aircraft is being manually controlled
      private double manualBearingTarget
      The target the player has told the aircraft to fly at when manually controlled
      static int MOUSE_LENIENCY
      How far away (in pixels) the mouse can be from the aircraft but still select it

      The name of the location the aircraft is flying from

      The position of the aircraft

      The physical size of the aircraft in pixels.
      private Waypoint[] route
      An array of waypoints from the aircraft's origin to its destination
      private int score
      The score a aircraft will reward the player with upon landing/clearing the airspace
      static int separationRule
      How far away another aircraft has to be to not cause a separation violation
      private Aircraft.AirportState status
      Whether the aircraft has reached its destination and can be disposed of
      private double turnSpeed
      How much the aircraft can turn per second, in radians
      private Vector velocity
      The velocity of the aircraft
      private static audio.Sound WARNING_SOUND
      A warning sound to be played when the aircraft enters separation violation

      • collisionWarningSoundFlag

        private boolean collisionWarningSoundFlag
        Flags whether the collision warning sound has been played before. If set, aircraft will not play warning again until it the separation violation involving it ends.

        private static final audio.Sound WARNING_SOUND
        A warning sound to be played when the aircraft enters separation violation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Aircraft

        public Aircraft(java.lang.String name,
        java.lang.String nameDestination,
        java.lang.String nameOrigin,
        Waypoint destinationPoint,
        Waypoint originPoint,
        graphics.Image img,
        double speed,
        Waypoint[] sceneWaypoints,
        Airport airport)
        Constructor for an aircraft.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the flight
        nameDestination - the name of the location to which the aircraft is going
        nameOrigin - the name of the location from which the aircraft hails
        destinationPoint - the end point of the aircraft's route
        originPoint - the point to initialise the aircraft
        img - the image to draw to represent the aircraft
        speed - the speed the aircraft will travel at
        sceneWaypoints - the waypoints on the map
        airport - the airport the aircraft is travelling to

        public double angleToTarget()
        Calculates the angle from the aircraft's position, to its current target.
        Returns:
        an angle in radians to the aircraft's current target.

      • outOfBounds

        public boolean outOfBounds()
        Checks whether the aircraft lies outside of the airspace.
        Returns:
        true, if the aircraft is out of the airspace. False, otherwise.

      • bearing

        public double bearing()
        Calculates the angle at which the aircraft is travelling.
        Returns:
        the angle in radians of the aircraft's current velocity.

      • isAt

        public boolean isAt(Vector point)
        Checks if the aircraft is at a given position.
        Parameters:
        point -
        Returns:
        true, if the aircraft is near enough the point. False, otherwise.

      • isTurningLeft

        public boolean isTurningLeft()
        Checks whether the angle at which the aircraft is turning is less than 0.
        Returns:
        true, if the aircraft is turning left (anti-clockwise). False, otherwise.

      • isTurningRight

        public boolean isTurningRight()
        Checks whether the angle at which the aircraft is turning is greater than 0.
        Returns:
        true, if the aircraft is turning right (clockwise). False, otherwise.

      • flightPathContains

        public int flightPathContains(Waypoint waypoint)
        Checks the aircraft's route to see if a waypoint is included in it.
        Parameters:
        waypoint - the waypoint to check for.
        Returns:
        true, if the waypoint is in the aircraft's route. False, otherwise.

      • doesflightPathContain

        public boolean doesflightPathContain(Waypoint waypoint)

      • alterPath

        public void alterPath(int routeStage,
             Waypoint newWaypoint)
        Edits the aircraft's path by changing the waypoint it will go to at a certain stage in its route.
        Parameters:
        routeStage - the stage at which the new waypoint will replace the old.
        newWaypoint - the new waypoint to travel to.

      • isMouseOver

        public boolean isMouseOver(int mx,
                  int my)
        Checks whether the mouse cursor is over this aircraft.
        Parameters:
        mx - the x coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        my - the y coordinate of the mouse cursor.
        Returns:
        true, if the mouse is close enough to this aircraft; false otherwise

      • isMouseOver

        public boolean isMouseOver()
        Calls isMouseOver(int, int) using input.mouseX() and input.mouseY() as the arguments.
        Returns:
        true, if the mouse is close enough to this aircraft; false otherwise

      • update

        public void update(double dt)
        Updates the aircraft's position and bearing, the stage of its route, and whether it has finished its flight.
        Parameters:
        dt -

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft(double dt)
        Turns the aircraft left.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time elapsed since the last frame.

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight(double dt)
        Turns the aircraft right.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time elapsed since the last frame.

      • turnBy

        private void turnBy(double angle)
        Turns the aircraft by a certain angle (in radians). Positive angles turn the aircraft clockwise.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle by which to turn.

      • turnTowardsTarget

        private void turnTowardsTarget(double dt)
        Turns the aircraft towards its current target. How much it turns is determined by the aircraft's turnSpeed.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time elapsed since the last frame.

        public void draw(int controlAltitude)
        Draws the aircraft and any warning circles if necessary.

        public void drawModifiedPath(int modified,
                    double mouseX,
                    double mouseY)
        Visually represents the pathpoint being moved.
        Parameters:

        mouseY - current position of mouse

      • findGreedyRoute

        public Waypoint[] findGreedyRoute(Waypoint origin,
                         Waypoint destination,
                         Waypoint[] waypoints)
        Creates a sensible route from an origin to a destination from an array of waypoints. Waypoint costs are considered according to distance from current aircraft location Costs are further weighted by distance from waypoint to destination
        Parameters:
        origin - the waypoint from which to begin
        destination - the waypoint at which to end
        waypoints - the waypoints to be used
        Returns:
        a sensible route between the origin and the destination, using a sensible amount of waypoint

      • updateCollisions

        public int updateCollisions(double dt,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Aircraft> aircraftList)
        Updates the amount of aircraft which are too close, violating the separation rules, and also checks for crashes.
        Parameters:
        dt - the time elapsed since the last frame.
        aircraftList - the list of aircraft to update
        Returns:
        0 if no collisions, 1 if separation violation, 2 if crash

      • isWithin

        private boolean isWithin(Aircraft aircraft,
               int distance)
        Checks whether an aircraft is within a certain distance from this one.
        Parameters:
        aircraft - the aircraft to check.
        distance - the distance within which to care about.
        Returns:
        true, if the aircraft is within the distance. False, otherwise.
